   20: -module(bif_no_type_opt_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   25: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   26: 	 beam_validator/1,trunc_and_friends/1,cover_safe_and_pure_bifs/1,
   27:          cover_trim/1,
   28:          head_tail/1,
   29:          min_max/1]).
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [{group,p}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   39:       [beam_validator,
   40:        trunc_and_friends,
   41:        cover_safe_and_pure_bifs,
   42:        cover_trim,
   43:        head_tail,
   44:        min_max
   45:       ]}].
   46: 
   47: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     _ = id(Config),
   49:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: %% Cover code in beam_validator.
   62: 
   63: beam_validator(Config) ->
   64:     [false,Config] = food(Config),
   65: 
   66:     true = is_number(42.0),
   67:     false = is_port(Config),
   68: 
   69:     ok.
   70: 
   71: food(Curriculum) ->
   72:     [try
   73: 	 is_bitstring(functions)
   74:      catch _ ->
   75: 	     0
   76:      end, Curriculum].
   77: 
   78: %% Test trunc/1, round/1, floor/1, ceil/1.
   79: trunc_and_friends(_Config) ->
   80:     Bifs = [trunc,round,floor,ceil],
   81:     Fs = trunc_and_friends_1(Bifs),
   82:     Mod = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
   83:     Calls = [begin
   84: 		 Atom = erl_syntax:function_name(N),
   85: 		 ?Q("'@Atom'()")
   86: 	     end || N <- Fs],
   87:     Tree = ?Q(["-module('@Mod@').",
   88: 	       "-export([test/0]).",
   89: 	       "test() -> _@Calls, ok.",
   90: 	       "id(I) -> I."]) ++ Fs,
   91:     merl:print(Tree),
   92:     Opts = test_lib:opt_opts(?MODULE),
   93:     {ok,_Bin} = merl:compile_and_load(Tree, Opts),
   94:     Mod:test(),
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: trunc_and_friends_1([F|Fs]) ->
   98:     Func = list_to_atom("f"++integer_to_list(length(Fs))),
   99:     [trunc_template(Func, F)|trunc_and_friends_1(Fs)];
  100: trunc_and_friends_1([]) -> [].
  101: 
  102: trunc_template(Func, Bif) ->
  103:     Val = 42.77,
  104:     Res = erlang:Bif(Val),
  105:     FloatRes = float(Res),
  106:     ?Q("'@Func@'() ->
  107:         Var = id(_@Val@),
  108:         if _@Bif@(Var) =:= _@Res@ -> ok end,
  109: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@FloatRes@ -> ok end,
  110: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@Res@ -> ok end,
  111:         _@Res@ = _@Bif@(Var),
  112:         try begin _@Bif@(a), ok end
  113:         catch error:badarg -> ok end,
  114:         ok.").
  115: 
  116: cover_safe_and_pure_bifs(Config) ->
  117:     _ = get(),
  118:     _ = get_keys(a),
  119:     _ = group_leader(),
  120:     _ = is_alive(),
  121:     _ = min(Config, []),
  122:     _ = nodes(),
  123:     _ = erlang:ports(),
  124:     _ = pre_loaded(),
  125:     _ = processes(),
  126:     _ = registered(),
  127:     _ = term_to_binary(Config),
  128:     42 = list_to_integer("2A", 16),
  129:     a = binary_to_atom(atom_to_binary(a)),
  130: 
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: cover_trim(_Config) ->
  134:     ok = cover_trim_1(<<"abc">>, id([42])),
  135:     ok = cover_trim_1({a,b,c}, id([42])),
  136: 
  137:     true = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "1"),
  138:     false = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "0"),
  139:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "1"),
  140:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "0"),
  141: 
  142:     true = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", -1),
  143:     false = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", 100),
  144:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -10),
  145:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -100),
  146: 
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: cover_trim_1(Something, V) ->
  150:     id(Something),
  151:     id(Something),
  152:     if
  153:         hd(V) =:= 42 ->
  154:             ok
  155:     end.
  156: 
  157: cover_trim_2(Header, NList)->
  158:     id(0),
  159:     case id(Header) of
  160:         "keep-alive" when hd(NList) >= $1 ->
  161:             true;
  162:         _Connect ->
  163:             false
  164:     end.
  165: 
  166: cover_trim_3(Header, N)->
  167:     id(0),
  168:     case id(Header) of
  169:         "keep-alive" when abs(N) < 42 ->
  170:             true;
  171:         _Connect ->
  172:             false
  173:     end.
  174: 
  175: %% GH-7024: The loader transformations for hd/1 and tl/1 were incorrect and
  176: %% failed when certain optimizations were turned off.
  177: head_tail(_Config) ->
  178:     {1, ok} = head_case(),
  179:     {1, ok} = tail_case(),
  180: 
  181:     1 = hd(id([1])),
  182:     [] = tl(id([1])),
  183: 
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: head_case() ->
  187:     case 1 of
  188:         X when hd(X) -> blurf;
  189:         X -> {X, ok}
  190:     end.
  191: 
  192: tail_case() ->
  193:     case 1 of
  194:         X when tl(X) -> blurf;
  195:         X -> {X, ok}
  196:     end.
  197: 
  198: min_max(_Config) ->
  199:     False = id(false),
  200:     True = id(true),
  201: 
  202:     false = bool_min_false(False, False),
  203:     false = bool_min_false(False, True),
  204:     false = bool_min_false(True, False),
  205:     true = bool_min_true(True, True),
  206: 
  207:     false = bool_max_false(False, False),
  208:     true = bool_max_true(False, True),
  209:     true = bool_max_true(True, False),
  210:     true = bool_max_true(True, True),
  211: 
  212:     11 = min_increment(100),
  213:     11 = min_increment(10),
  214:     10 = min_increment(9),
  215:     1 = min_increment(0),
  216:     0 = min_increment(-1),
  217:     11 = min_increment(a),
  218: 
  219:     {42,42} = max_number(id(42)),
  220:     {42,42.0} = max_number(id(42.0)),
  221:     {-1,1} = max_number(id(-1)),
  222:     {-1,1} = max_number(id(-1.0)),
  223: 
  224:     100 = int_clamped_add(-1),
  225:     100 = int_clamped_add(0),
  226:     105 = int_clamped_add(5),
  227:     110 = int_clamped_add(10),
  228:     110 = int_clamped_add(11),
  229: 
  230:     100 = num_clamped_add(-1),
  231:     100 = num_clamped_add(0),
  232:     105 = num_clamped_add(5),
  233:     110 = num_clamped_add(10),
  234:     110 = num_clamped_add(11),
  235: 
  236:     105 = num_clamped_add(5),
  237:     105.0 = num_clamped_add(5.0),
  238:     110 = num_clamped_add(a),
  239:     110 = num_clamped_add({a,b,c}),
  240:     110 = num_clamped_add({a,b,c}),
  241: 
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: %% GH-7170: The following functions would cause a crash in
  245: %% beam_ssa_codegen.
  246: 
  247: bool_min_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  248:     false = min(A, B).
  249: 
  250: bool_min_true(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  251:     true = min(A, B).
  252: 
  253: bool_max_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  254:     false = max(A, B).
  255: 
  256: bool_max_true(A, B) when is_boolean(B) ->
  257:     true = max(A, B),
  258:     if
  259:         is_boolean(A) ->
  260:             true = max(A, B)
  261:     end.
  262: 
  263: max_number(A) ->
  264:     Res = {trunc(A), max(A, 1)},
  265:     Res = {trunc(A), max(1, A)}.
  266: 
  267: min_increment(A) ->
  268:     Res = min(10, A) + 1,
  269:     Res = min(A, 10) + 1,
  270:     Res = min(id(A), 10) + 1.
  271: 
  272: int_clamped_add(A) when is_integer(A) ->
  273:     min(max(A, 0), 10) + 100.
  274: 
  275: num_clamped_add(A) ->
  276:     min(max(A, 0), 10) + 100.
  277: 
  278: %%%
  279: %%% Common utilities.
  280: %%%
  281: 
  282: id(I) ->
  283:     I.
